Class BackupStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zookeeper.server.backup.monitoring.BackupStats
  • public class BackupStats
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains ZK backup related statistics

    • Constructor Detail

      • BackupStats

        public BackupStats()

    • Method Detail

      • getNumConsecutiveFailedSnapshotIterations

        public int getNumConsecutiveFailedSnapshotIterations()
        Counter For example: if backup iteration A fails, the number is 1; if next backup iteration B succeeds, the number is reset to 0. If A fails, the number is 1; if then B fails too, the number is incremented to 2.
        Returns:
        Number of consecutive snapshot backup errors since last successful snapshot backup iteration

      • getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulSnapshotIteration

        public long getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulSnapshotIteration()
        Counter
        Returns:
        Time passed (minutes) since last successful snapshot backup iteration

      • getSnapshotBackupActiveStatus

        public boolean getSnapshotBackupActiveStatus()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        If snapshot backup is currently actively ongoing

      • getSnapshotIterationDuration

        public long getSnapshotIterationDuration()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        How long it took to complete the last snapshot backup iteration

      • getNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpLastIteration

        public int getNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpLastIteration()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        Number of snapshot files that were backed up to backup storage in last snapshot backup iteration

      • setSnapshotBackupIterationStart

        public void setSnapshotBackupIterationStart()
        Record the status and timestamp when a snapshot backup iteration starts

      • setSnapshotBackupIterationDone

        public void setSnapshotBackupIterationDone​(boolean errorFree)
        Record the status and timestamp when a snapshot backup iteration finishes
        Parameters:
        errorFree - If this iteration finishes without error

      • incrementNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpThisIteration

        public void incrementNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpThisIteration()
        To be called during snapshot backup iteration every time one more snapshot file is backed up A helper to keep track value for "numberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpLastIteration" metric

      • getNumConsecutiveFailedTxnLogIterations

        public int getNumConsecutiveFailedTxnLogIterations()
        Counter For example: if backup iteration A fails, the number is 1; if next backup iteration B succeeds, the number is reset to 0. If A fails, the number is 1; if then B fails too, the number is incremented to 2.
        Returns:
        Number of consecutive txn log backup errors since last successful txn log backup iteration

      • getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulTxnLogIteration

        public long getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulTxnLogIteration()
        Counter
        Returns:
        Time passed (minutes) since last successful txn log backup iteration

      • getTxnLogBackupActiveStatus

        public boolean getTxnLogBackupActiveStatus()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        If txn log backup is currently actively ongoing

      • getTxnLogIterationDuration

        public long getTxnLogIterationDuration()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        How long it took to complete the last txn log backup iteration

      • setTxnLogBackupIterationStart

        public void setTxnLogBackupIterationStart()
        Record the status and timestamp when a txn log backup iteration starts

      • setTxnLogBackupIterationDone

        public void setTxnLogBackupIterationDone​(boolean errorFree)
        Record the status and timestamp when a txn log backup iteration finishes
        Parameters:
        errorFree - If this iteration finishes without error
